data.title: What film depicted a fictional meeting between Marilyn Monroe and Albert Einstein?
data.text:
In the original version of "The Exorcist", which character was played by a real priest instead of an actor?

Movie Trivia / August 16, 2024

Father Dyer. The part of Father Dyer was played by Father William O'Malley.

In the movie "Pretty Woman", what is the name of the bartender at The Blue Banana?

Movie Trivia / August 16, 2024

Pops. In "Pretty Woman", Richard Gere takes Julia Roberts to "La Traviata", an opera about a prostitute who falls in love with a wealthy man.

Who plays a surrogate mother in the 2008 film "Baby Mama"?

Movie Trivia / August 15, 2024

Amy Poehler. While in college, Amy Poehler was part of a comedy group called "My Mother's Flea Bag".

Which film features a motorcycle cross-country ride?

Movie Trivia / August 15, 2024

American Dresser. The 2018 film, "American Dresser", stars Tom Berenger and Keith David.

What kind of competition did Guy Pearce win as a teenager?

Movie Trivia / August 14, 2024

Body Building. Guy Pearce was born in 1967 in Cambridgeshire, England, and at fifteen won the "Mr. Junior Victoria" body building competition.
